header.heading: About us
header.subhead: We’re an independent movement of more than one million people working to build a progressive Australia and put people back into politics.

who.heading: Who we are
who.subhead: The GetUp movement is driven by the hopes and values of everyday people.
body: By combining the power of one million members, movement partners, and a central team of expert strategists, we do what it takes to make an extraordinary impact.

GetUp members come from every walk of life, and are united by a shared belief in fairness, compassion, and courage. Together they set our movement’s agenda on issues they care about, from human rights and climate action to economic fairness and First Nations justice.

what.heading: What we work on
what.subhead: Our work is driven by values, not party politics.
body: From making sure people are able to vote in elections to successfully stopping major projects threatening the Great Barrier Reef, our movement has a decade-long history of taking on powerful interests — and winning.

items.text: Fighting for a safe and healthy climate
Protecting the future of our reef
Stopping the world’s biggest coal mine
Campaigning for a fair and just Australia

how.heading: How we do it
how.subhead: We do whatever it takes to make genuine progress on issues our movement cares about.
body: Together with our team of experienced strategists, our members use their voice, time, and skills to take action that moves the needle online and offline.

strategies.heading: Online actions
strategies.body: Simple actions that together amount to significant power: signing petitions, writing to influence key decision makers, or chipping in to help fund polling, research, or advertising.

strategies.heading: Offline actions
strategies.body: Careful, strategic, and bold action in the real world: meeting local MPs, handing out How To Vote cards at polling booths, or attending rallies.

strategies.heading: In the media
strategies.body: Using our powerful and respected voice in Australian politics: building greater awareness of the issues we care about, and holding decision makers accountable to the public.

donations.heading: Supporting GetUp
donations.subhead: By supporting GetUp, you’re helping power a million-strong, strategically savvy organisation that makes real change happen.
body: Together, we’re not just heard—when GetUp speaks, power listens. We've won a High Court case, secured millions for mental health funding, compelled governments to begin cracking down on multinational tax avoidance, and united to win Marriage Equality. Every dollar you donate to our movement goes toward building a more fair, flourishing, and just Australia.
Your donation will be used to fund billboards that get our messages in front of decision makers, hard-hitting TV ads in the lounge rooms of key electorates, and rallies demonstrating people power.

Our Crew regular donors allow us to plan big, tackle bold long-term goals, and remain fiercely independent—free to challenge big money and party politics while staying accountable to the people who power our movement.
Your voice matters. Your actions make a difference. Together, we achieve the extraordinary.
